com.iKairos.TrafficSim

Class Models.IDM

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iKairos.TrafficSim.Models.IDM
  • Enclosing class:
    Models

    public class Models.IDM
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the properties and methods of the Intelligent Driver Model due to Treiber et al.
    The model's main function is to determine the acceleration of a vehicle given a set of parameters about its current condition of speed and the condition of its leading vehicle The IDM used is as defined here: M. Treiber et al., Intelligent Driver Model
    An instance of this object should be created once at the start of the simulation and reused by all subsequent calls to the method calculateAcceleration() to save computational resources.
    Author:
    Nimrod

        public double calculateAcceleration(Agents.Vehicle leading,
                           Agents.Vehicle vehicle)
        Calculates the acceleration of the client vehicle using the IDM.
        Parameters:
        leading - The vehicle ahead of the requester vehicle
        vehicle - The vehicle whose acceleration to calculate
        Returns:
        The acceleration of the requester vehicle
